skins.title: Ordered List
skins.doc: Ordered list. Shows an numbered indicator for each list item. Can be extended via skin classes

skins.title: Bulleted List
skins.doc: Unordered list. Base class. Skins and subclasses that extend ul should add their classname to this element.

skins.title: Unbulleted list
skins.doc: An unordered list with no bullets and has top and bottom margin.

skins.bodyContent: Simple text next to a small icon.

skins.title: Right aligned media block
skins.bodyContent: Media block with a right aligned image. Note that the media block expands to fill all the space available.

skins.title: Right and left aligned media block
skins.bodyContent: This media block has an image aligned to the right via the imgExt class applied to the image wrapper. Images can be right, left, or both. skins.doc: Base class. Required. Skins and subclasses that extend btn should add their classname to this element.

skins.dock: Skin class. Turn off margin on both sides
